description:
The "bewitching band" accessory is obtainable as both a downloadable bonus for the digital version and as a mega-rare drop via regular gameplay. 

Special bonuses exclusive to the digital version can be obtained in-game by pressing the Y button to open the "Pix-e Pod" menu; selecting the "Pix-e Portal" app; then "Enter a code"; and "Receive downloaded goods.

The English release of SNACK WORLD: The Dungeon Crawl—GOLD does not support real-world jara and snack toys. Instead, all content that was only available via scanning the NFC toys is now available by having Sam Witch tell your daily fortune in her canopé.
name:
SNACK WORLD: THE DUNGEON CRAWL — GOLD
Special Bonus
